BadgeDetail.Name: Engine Mechanics I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of engine mechanics. It demonstrates they are able to drain engine oil, replace and oil filter; carry out valve clearance adjustments and replace and tension an accessory belt. They are also able to inspect engine mounts and locate an oil leak.

Task.Title: Getting oily
Task.Body: Upload evidence showing how to locate an oil leak, drain engine oil and replace an oil filter.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence showing how to locate an oil leak, drain engine oil and replace an oil filter.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence showing how to *locate an oil leak*, drain *engine oil* and *replace an oil filter*.

Task.Title: Valves, belts and mounts
Task.Body: Upload evidence adjusting valve clearance, replacing and tensioning an accessory belt and inspecting engine mounts.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence adjusting valve clearance, replacing and tensioning an accessory belt and inspecting engine mounts.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence adjusting *valve clearance*, replacing and tensioning an *accessory belt* and inspecting *engine mounts*.
